title: Starter T3 runes now on permanent discount

replies.body: Runes Tell Us the stats it gives: Masteries dont......... RITO PLS
Masteries tell you in more detail exactly what they do. if you cant read a few simple masteries then you don't deserve to know.
Because there's too many stats. Try just putting one point into the first tier of masteries in each tree, and see how many different stats you get.
srsly i spend all my ip like 8000 on runes yesterday and you telling me that have discount today. WOWWWWWWWW
your the idiot really...because about a week ago they said that this was coming. that is why i put off buying my fifth runepage

First time comment im getting so over oce.... Can't help but feel like oce is screwed wait 2 years for server skin then find out we have to pay for it. i have a smurf and main both have all these runes and now u say its half price permanently i literally bought all these runes 2 weeks ago on my smurf.... its not even easy to farm ip half the games u play someone trolls u and when u get mad u  get reported and whenever i play and troll because some1 has trolled me no1 reports me and every gets mad at the person that gets trolled its actually a joke this reform system breeds trolls, if u troll nothing happens if u get angry at a troll your "toxic". Even when your not being toxic people just abuse other people for doing bad when theyre doing bad as well... then you defend the other person and cop abuse and reports as well.... its slightly better people play solo lanes at least you can't get trolled by laning partner as much but when your adc + support and the support afks and its a 1 v 2 lane and people abuse you and say its your fault u get dominated i think u have a right to be angry and if u vent your anger you are reported and the troll wins its awesome how this system works.
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} More pls

The Man Speeketh The Truth, yet RITO is an American based company so why would they care as long as we play and give them money for RP now and then they don't give a f*** if we are abused, threatened or made to feel bad, we're just little oce. Yesterday I got super abused by a malphite who took mid and forced me to play support. He then abused me for every thresh hook I missed and made no comment on all the ones I landed, I muted him but I could still see my team arguing with him constantly as they pushed our nexus he made sure every one else knew it was there fault, end of the game I didn't even bother reporting. Why would I, at best it will warn him and he'll go do it again

Why are so many people complaining that there is a sale? That's like complaining when you're given chocolate.

"But i just bought runes the day before they put the sale on" 
There has to be a day that they put on the sale and there has to be a day they notify you about the sale. They are not mind readers. They cannot know when every single person is going to going to buy runes. If you bought runes before the sale that is your problem, not theirs

thanks riot now i can buy my fifth rune page. hate it how ppl are complaining on how they only bought it yesterday and how its not fair, NEWS FLASH: THIS IS FOR PEOPLE JUST STARTING THEIR RUNE PAGES AND IF U HAD ENOUGH IP FOR THOSE RUNES THEN THIS SAIL WAS NOT FOR YOU ANYWAY. thats just my opinion, thanks for reading.
Well said.
People so salty about having already bought these runes. This is only ever a good thing, since all the price does is slow people down. It's not some sort of skill cap.
First!
last...
why do they always say RITO instead of RIOT ??
cause they are 12vies and think they are pro !
its prolly a good thing to have the runes reduced in price now more nubs will have them HOPEFULLY!

OMG NOW THEY PUT IT ON SALE! 

 i just bought my runes on sunday. fml
well they did say about a week or 2 ago that they were doing this
Lol when you have over 30,000 ip and nothing left to buy with it...
Yay.
It get runes not found error.

Good thing I didn't buy runes yesterday.
